content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>Добро пожаловать на Проект Русь - Welcome to Project Rus</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.Green>   Приготовьтесь выживать, приручать и исследовать мир, полный динозавров и приключений.</>
<TextStyle.Green>   Стройте свою базу, создавайте альянсы и преодолевайте предстоящие испытания.</>
<TextStyle.Green>   Удачи, выживший!</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>Правила сервера</>
<TextStyle.Orange>Rules</>
content.text:
1.1 Any discussion of administrative actions, ignoring administrator warnings is prohibited; this also applies to restart times, rules, and gameplay. As a punishment for rule violations, warnings/mutes/temporary or permanent bans will be used at the discretion of the administration.
1.2 The use of nicknames/tribe names/names for dinosaurs that contain: profanity, obscene language, racism, extremism, criminal expressions, plagiarism, advertising, pornography, erotic content, threats of violence, or any other offensive information towards other players and the administration is prohibited; this also includes names with symbols and hieroglyphs, advertising other servers and YouTube channels (examples of unacceptable nicknames and Steam names: 123, Человек, human, &@#№, etc.). Punishment: warning with a nickname change.
1.3 The use of any scripts, cheats, dupes, hacks, or bugs is prohibited. Punishment: ban.

Communication
2.1 Profanity, insults towards the administration and other players in the game chat/server Discord are prohibited. Punishment: mute/ban.
2.2 Discussing religious/political/racial topics is prohibited. Punishment: ban.
2.3 Posting advertising texts, advertising third-party servers, and commercial messages, as well as any statements directed at other players with the aim of encouraging them to leave the server, both in local and voice chat, and server Discord, is prohibited. Punishment: warning/mute/ban.

Gameplay Moments
3.1 The tribe name must be the same across all maps. Punishment: warning with a tribe name change.
3.2 Any PvP activity is prohibited. Punishment: ban.
3.3 Being on someone else's base without the owner's consent is prohibited; if you are asked to leave someone else's base, you must do so. Punishment: warning/temporary ban.
3.4 Frequent changing of the tribe name is prohibited, no more than once a week. Punishment: warning/temporary ban.
3.5 Any monetary transactions between players (selling real money for donation animals/items and their derivatives) are prohibited. Punishment: warning/ban.
3.6 Any player activity leading to the acquisition of someone else's property (looting corpses, bags, mating other players' dinosaurs, etc.) is prohibited. Punishment: warning/ban.
3.7 Interfering with other players' events (missions, bosses, etc.) is prohibited. Punishment: warning/temporary ban.
3.8 Joining tribes with the intention of robbing/insiding is prohibited (warning for players - be more responsible in selecting your co-tribemates, set ranks in your tribe). Punishment: ban.
3.9 Looting anything on someone else's base, stealing fertilized eggs from other bases is prohibited. Punishment: ban.
3.10 Raiding someone else's base after the building timer has expired or claiming someone else's dinosaurs and structures upon unclaiming is prohibited. Punishment: ban.

Construction and Bases
After three warnings for any of the points, ALL structures of your tribe on that map may be removed.
4.1 Only one base per tribe is allowed on the map; a base is defined as a structure larger than 2x2 foundations that contains crafting and respawn structures. Structures not meeting this regulation fall under the next point. Punishment: removal of excess structures without warning.
4.2 Placing single foundations, pillars, and spikes, or any separate building elements outside your base is prohibited. Punishment: warning with structure removal.
4.3 Traps for dinosaurs are prohibited. They must always be open and have a common status. Punishment: warning with structure removal.
4.4 Blocking the spawn points of new players/resources/loot - ground and underwater beams/beaver huts is prohibited. Punishment: removal of excess structures without warning.
4.5 Blocking vegetable gardens and castles on the Ragnarok map, Charge Node (Aberration), terminals, drops, and veins is prohibited. Punishment: removal of excess structures without warning.
4.6 Blocking access to notes/runestones, obelisks, city terminals, and approaches to them is prohibited (access must be available both on foot and with the ability to fly on dinosaurs). Punishment: removal of excess structures without warning.
4.7 Blocking caves with resources and artifacts (except for empty caves)/large resource deposits is prohibited. Punishment: removal of excess structures without warning.
4.8 Blocking structures with single foundations and other actions that hinder the development of other players is prohibited. Punishment: removal of excess structures without warning.
4.9 After taming or joining another tribe, leaving behind structures/spikes/foundations is prohibited. If you accidentally switch to another tribe, contact the administration. Punishment: warning with structure removal.
4.10 Placing more than 4 large frames/8 regular frames on a base is prohibited; installing more than 8 cloning chambers, 15 vivariums, or 8 Gacha Gatherers is prohibited. Punishment: removal of excess structures without warning.
4.11 Blocking someone else's safes and dinosaurs (whether abandoned or not) is prohibited. Punishment: removal of excess structures without warning.
4.12 Locking and blocking oil pumps, sap taps, and gas collectors (restricting access, for example, by building around the pump, etc.) is prohibited. Punishment: removal of excess structures without warning.
4.13 Building too close to someone else's structures and restricting the development of another tribe with your structures is prohibited. Punishment: removal of excess structures without warning.
4.14 Teleporters placed under tech domes/in closed spaces must be closed to outsiders. Punishment: removal of the teleporter without warning.
4.15 Placing teleporters near drops/artifacts/caves is prohibited. Exception: honey cave on the Crystal Isles map. Punishment: removal of the teleporter without warning.

Dinosaurs
5.1 Selling dinosaurs with stats above 152 is prohibited. Dinosaurs with stats from 75-152 may be sold if they are neutered/spayed. Dinosaurs with stats below 75 can be sold without restrictions.
5.2 The animal limit per tribe is 200. The dinosaur limit on these maps is 152; animals exceeding the limit must be stored in cryopods.
5.3 The dinosaur limit on 1 map: Tek Strider/Astrodelphis - 2 per tribe; Gacha - 8 per tribe; taming Brontos/Diplodocus/Titanosaurs is prohibited. Punishment: removal of excess dinosaurs without warning.
5.4 Selling/trading/giving away donation dinosaurs/their clones acquired in the "Tethered Dinosaurs" category is prohibited.
5.5 It is prohibited to store/leave your dinosaurs at obelisks and caves with artifacts/bosses. Punishment: removal of excess dinosaurs without warning.
5.6 Releasing your dinosaurs on aggressive mode outside your bases is prohibited. Your dinosaurs must stay at your base or in cryopods. They must not roam the map or wander onto someone else's bases or farm meat/resources/experience. Punishment: removal of excess dinosaurs without warning.
Transfer/Restoration
Using transfers and cryopods is at your own risk. Attention: items, characters, and animals may disappear during transfer; dinosaurs, items, and characters lost during loading/unloading through transfer are not restored.

Items lost due to your death while completing missions are not eligible for restoration.

Restoration of dinosaurs by the administration is only possible in cases of animal death due to server issues, which can only occur during a restart (not a global update) or server crash and with a screenshot of the tribe log showing the dinosaur's death at that time.

Loot loss is not considered (a dinosaur in a cryopod is equated to loot).

The administration is not responsible for game bugs, pits, holes, textures, disappearing from homes, glitches and disappearing into the air, getting stuck in textures, animals, etc., as well as client-side game crashes - all these issues should be directed to the game developers or your provider.

The server administration does not restore characters because, firstly, restoring a character is impossible; secondly, the server logs do not account for character disappearances (as well as resources, items, and animals in transfer), and proving that your character was lost due to server fault, rather than because you overwrote it by creating a new one, also becomes impossible. The only thing we can do in the case of character loss is to return the tribe leader rights if the character was the owner, upon providing evidence. In 90% of cases, the character remains in the cloud; to find it, simply click the "Load Survivor" button when creating a character and wait 5-10 minutes; if necessary, repeat this procedure on all cluster servers.

Donations
According to Article 582 of the Civil Code of the Russian Federation, all donations made on this site are voluntary and non-refundable.

Funds received from donors are used to pay for the rental of equipment on which game servers are hosted, advertising, and other methods of developing the non-profit project for the game Ark, for players with a licensed digital copy of the game purchased through the official Steam service.

As a thank you for voluntary support in the form of monetary donations, donors can use the provided donation store and receive in-game items presented in it, exclusively within the game servers linked to this service.

In case of item loss due to project fault (server crash or due to any hosting issues), the project compensates the donation balance within the service so that the donor can obtain the item again in the game.

The administration is not obligated to return what you lost due to bugs, rollbacks, wipes, theft, and other issues.

In the event of a user being banned on the game servers for violating server rules, no donations will be refunded.

content.title: Полезные команды
